QuestData.Title: A Steady Hand
QuestData.Description: The black walnut extract you purchased from Miss Whiteblossom is but one of many extracts we keep in stock for various applications.$b$bBlushleaf extract can be gathered from the flowers in the Waxwood Forest to the west. Several units can be extracted from one flower, but only those with calm nerves and steady hands can remove all of the extract from one flower.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain 80 vials of Blushleaf Extract from Blushleaf Clusters in the Waxwood Forest.
QuestData.CompletionText: It is said that the ancient herbalism masters were able to remove 20 vials of extract from each blossom.
QuestData.RewardText: Do not forget to wash your hands. Blushleaf stains forever.
